sentences.english: Have a special inventive mind the design and the specialized service quality form a splendorous contrast.
sentences.chinese: 独具匠心的设计与专业的服务品质相映成辉。

sentences.english: Professor Li Liangyu always makes great efforts and shows unusual ingenuity in his supervision of Ph. D. candidates in writing dissertations.
sentences.chinese: 李良玉教授指导博士论文，倾尽全力，独具匠心。

sentences.english: Railway father Zhan Tianyou showed ingenuity in building railways .
sentences.chinese: 铁路之父詹天佑独具匠心筑路与创造。
